title: Crete wildfire forces 1,500 to evacuate as Europe heatwave continues
description: Fire on island being fanned by gale-force winds as blazes also rage on mainland Greece and in Germany
content: A wildfire fanned by gale-force winds has forced the evacuation of more than 1,500 people on the Greek island of Crete, officials have said, as large swathes of continental Europe baked in a punishing early summer heatwave linked to at least nine dea... [4861 chars]

title: Athora to acquire Pension Insurance Corporation Group
description: Pension Insurance Corporation Group Limited (“PICG”), ultimate parent company of Pension Insurance Corporation plc (“PIC”), the specialist insurer of UK defined benefit pension schemes, today announces that Athora Holding Limited (“Athora”) has agreed to acquire PICG for approximately £5.7 billion.
content: Pension Insurance Corporation Group Limited (“PICG”), ultimate parent company of Pension Insurance Corporation plc (“PIC”), the specialist insurer of UK defined benefit pension schemes, today announces that Athora Holding Limited (“Athora”) has agree... [5179 chars]

title: A Game Called Date Everything Literally Lets You Date Everything—Except People
description: The new dating sim’s characters range from polyamorous to asexual, but none of them are human.
content: Lux, a catty, bottle blonde personification of my house lights, has just informed me we’re dating—as long as I can follow a few rules. The influencer, whose head is haloed by a ring light, has a few notable ones: I need to take them out to the most c... [2683 chars]
